description:
Use this for Microsoft Azure Service Bus Queues, Topics, Relay and Notification Hubs backend operations. 
		
It adds Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll along with related configuration files to your project. This library allows AMQP 1.0 to be used as one of the protocols for communication with Microsoft Azure Service Bus. Notification Hubs support sending push notifications to Windows, Windows Phone, iOS and Android. 
		
For more information on Messaging features, please visit: http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/services/service-bus/
For more information on Notification Hub, please visit: http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/notification-hubs-overview/
For more information on Event Hub features, please visit: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=403957
		
Please note that this package requires .Net Framework 4 Full Profile.
releaseNotes:
Ths following fixes and improvements were made in this build:
- EventHub: Fix EventData.GetBytes so that it can be called multiple times and not interfered by other EvenData stream based Api.
- EventHub/Messaging: Fixed a potential bug in Amqp path where some of the UnauthorizedAccessException and QuotaExceededException scenarioes are incorrectly returning MessagingException.
- EventHub/Messaging: Improved Amqp tracing related to Amqp connection behaviors for better diagnostic purposes.
- EventHub/Messaging: Fixed a bug in CreateFromConnectionString() api where the logic for using cached factory instance can ignore Sas signture comparison.
- Messaging: Changed internal implementation of Messaging AutoDetect behavior, so that it will now switch to Https over WebSocket rather than over WebStream when Tcp is unavailable .
- Relay: fix a bug where the ConnectionStatusBehaviour "Online" event is not fired after network disconnect and reconnect scenario
summary: Client library for Microsoft Azure Service Bus Queues, Topics, Relay and Notification Hubs backend operations.
title: Microsoft Azure Service Bus
